actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration, S. Rept. 93-1123.

official_title: Resolution relating to the printing of legislative proceedings with respect to the death of former Senator Wayne L. Morse.

summary.text: Requires the legislative proceedings in the United States Congress relating to the death of the former Senator from Oregon, Mr. Morse, to be printed as a Senate document.

titles.title: Resolution relating to the printing of legislative proceedings with respect to the death of former Senator Wayne L. Morse.
